gameDetails.name: Dungeon Fighter: Sir Dummy / The Hooded Hero promo cards
gameDetails.description: Promo of SPIEL 2015 for the game Dungeon Fighter. It's a new double sided character. Starting out as Sir Dummy, rolling a special symbol on a die will cause him to flip over to The Hooded Hero which has strong special abilities that also cause The Hooded Hero to be flipped back to Sir Dummy.
